description: We’re past the halfway point of our Kickstarter campaign for One Billion Users, a new competitive card game about building the biggest and best social media network. We’re very excited to get this game into people’s hands, but we won’t be able to do it without your support! If you want to try your hand […]
title: Less Than Two Weeks Remain To Help Us Release One Billion Users, The Social Media Card Game

description: Valve’s Steam PC gaming storefront appears to be on a bit of a pro-consumer kick as of late and I like it. We recently discussed the platform’s update to its purchase process, which now specifically includes explicit language around how the purchase is that of a revokable license to play the game, rather than any […]
title: Steam Adds Timeline Requirements, Refunds Around Its Pre-Order And Season Pass Policies
